output_list.vulnerability: Unprotected transfer function allows anyone to send tokens without restriction.
output_list.reason: This function allows anyone to transfer tokens freely, bypassing access controls and leading to potential exploitation.

output_list.vulnerability: Uncontrolled minting allows anyone to create tokens without restriction, leading to potential price manipulation and attacks.
output_list.reason: This function allows anyone to mint tokens and set them in circulation, bypassing existing controls and leading to potential price crashes and other attacks.
